typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		SequenceNumber as long,
		Offset as string,
		EnqueuedTimeUtc as string,
		SystemProperties as string,
		Properties as string,
		Body as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 select(mapColumn(
		SequenceNumber,
		Offset,
		EnqueuedTimeUtc,
		SystemProperties,
		Properties,
		Body
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 derive(BodyNew = toString(Body)) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 parse(MapBody = mapIf(BodyNew),
	format: 'json',
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine') ~> Parse1
Parse1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['outputavro.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
